Who Am I

Hello! I'm Evelyn, a designer with a deep interest in new modes of interaction & visual communication.
Studying as an undergraduate student in the School of Interactive Arts & Technology at Simon Fraser University helps me develope a wide range of interests and certain skill sets in music, digital games, films, and graphic art. While constantly exploring new techniques and seeing the world in new perspectives, I believe design is a tool to create more possibilities to bring meaning & connection to the users.
